entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Scott
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:28 PM CST Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.0°C

Observed at: Scott AAFC 11:00 PM CST Saturday 25 March 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 82 %

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 24 this evening. Forecast issued 8:29 PM CST Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Fog dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:29 PM CST Saturday 25 March 2023
